3rd Year Artificial Intelligence & Computer Science Student.

About me

I am a third-year artificial intelligence and computer science student at the University of Edinburgh. I am an analytical, curious and dedicated worker who is ready to integrate his optimistic and positive outlook into any team. I have a keen interest in how data analysis can be used to solve pressing global issues. I am looking to gain practical experience in the dynamic and expanding field of computer science to compliment my current knowledge and to extend my capabilities as a professional.

Learn more

Tutoring Services

Alongside my studies, I also provide private mathematics tutoring to students via Zoom. I have been tutoring for three years, teaching both HL IB Mathematics and IEB Mathematics (South Africa). If you are interested in this, please email be to find out more details.
